attributes.comment:
To Whom It May Concern:

I'm writing in regard to USCIS 2006-0044 proposed rule change increasing the fees
related to foriegn adoption.

Due to the increase in filings for foriegn adoptions, I sure there have been
increased costs to the government to handle the influx. However, it seems an
unconscionable thing that the federal government would seek to profit off potential
parents but certainly that is what this rule change would appear to do. A 66%
increase is an undue hardship. Perhaps if an increase is necessary to introduce
the increase by increments. Please consider the desire of parents to have
children and the need of children worldwide to find good homes with loving
parents.

Thank you for your consideration in this matter.

Sincerely
Amanda Moore

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Amanda J. Moore
